src:
Police rush to scene after man, 40, dies on Glasgow Street
Police were called to Parkneuk Road, Mansewood at around 9.50pm following the sudden death of the victim.
06 Nov 2019, 14:22 by Lynn Love
A 40-year-old man was found dead on a Glasgow street last night.
Police were called to Parkneuk Road, Mansewood at around 9.50pm following the sudden death of the victim.
There are no suspicious circumstances surrounding his death.
 
A Police Scotland spokesperson said: "Police Scotland attended at Parkneuk Road in Glasgow around 9.50pm on Tuesday, 5 November following the sudden death of a 40-year-old man.
"There are no suspicious circumstances and a report will be submitted to the Procurator Fiscal."
